{"id":583191982,"lang":"python3","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1636251848,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"184 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/583191982/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"17.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def validPalindrome(self, s: str) -> bool:\n        def isValid(l, r, oneWrong):\n            if l == r:\n                return True \n            while l < r:\n                if s[l] != s[r]:\n                    if oneWrong:\n                        return False\n                    else:\n                        # abbab -> return isValid(bbab) or isValid(abba)\n                        return isValid(l+1, r, True) or isValid(l, r-1, True)        \n                l += 1\n                r -= 1 \n            return True\n\n        return isValid(0, len(s) - 1, False)\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
